did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection contains correspondence, campus pictures, bulletins, and programs collected by Rudolph Brauer, graduate of the VPI class of 1915.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Rudolph Carl Brauer Memorabilia must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Rudolph Carl Brauer Memorabilia, Ms1982-011, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Rudolph Carl Brauer Memorabilia collection was acquired prior to 1982.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Rudolph Carl Brauer Memorabilia was completed in 1982. Additional information was completed in April 2011.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Rudolph Carl Brauer was in VPI class of 1915 where he studied mechanical engineering. During his senior year he was made Captain Band, President of Cotillion Club, President of the Senior Prom, Chairman Student Branch A.S.M.E., Science club, and he was the Editor-in-Chief ofÂ The Bugle, 1914-1915.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains correspondence, campus pictures, bulletins, and programs collected and compiled by Brauer while a student at VPI. The collection also includes several artifacts: a saber, VPI tie pin, and VPI fountain pen.
